name: TV with TV stand
description: My female client (30 y/o) is currently separated and in the process of divorce. She has one child, and they are living together in a one-room HDB rental unit in Woodlands. As she is struggling to make ends meet and pay off her outstanding arrears, she has requested assistance in obtaining a television (with a TV stand) for her son.

passiton.description: Well used. But still can watch basic functions

name: TV with stand
description:
A single mother living in a rental flat in Yishun, together with her 2-year-old child, is seeking a new or used TV with stand. The family’s 43-inch TV was recently damaged, and they currently do not have a suitable screen for the child’s learning needs.
The TV plays an important role in the child’s early development, as it is used to show educational videos that can support his learning and cognitive growth. Compared to watching content on a phone, a TV allows the child to sit further away from the screen which would encourage better posture and reduce eye strain.
The mother has shared that a contribution of a TV would greatly help maintain a supportive and engaging learning environment for the child.
